job.title: Staff Software Engineer, Sync

job.description: okta is the leading independent provider of enterprise identity the okta identity cloud enables organizations to securely connect the right people to the right technologies at the right time with over prebuilt integrations to applications and infrastructure providers okta customers can easily and securely use the best technologies for their business over organizations including th century fox jetblue nordstrom slack teach for america and twilio trust okta to help protect the identities of their workforces and customersltbrgtltbrgtthe vision is to make okta the de facto provider of the cloud identity and access management and help customer migrate to cloud based identity and access management solutionltbrgtltbrgtwe are looking for an experienced software engineer to join the sync engineering team that builds common services for importing and syncing user device and entitlement data these features allow customers the flexibility to link or enhance their business
